website_summaries.verdict: This budget model comes with features you'd expect to find on pricier options, but also has a few flaws.
pros: Brings out shine and calms frizz, as it employs ionic, tourmaline, and ceramic technologies
Fairly compact and lightweight, so it's easy to manoeuver
cons: Blows hot or cold air — no happy medium

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light but limited
customer_reviews.text: this hairdryer is surprisingly light and easy to hold but it also feels a little flimsy. The speed switch is quite lose and feels like it might break. I'm sending this item back because it only has 3 settings and one switch so you can't select heat/speed you want. You can have cold, slow and warm or fast and hot. You cannot select slow and hot or fast and warm due to only one switch. I hadn't realised this when I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Got on fire and smoke
customer_reviews.text: I used it only a few times since the day I bought. And after I used once and when I turned off the dryer, it got smoke inside and spreaded out all over the room. The dryer was completely broken all of a sudden without any reason. The description of the item says it has three years guarantee. So I requested a replacement. But refused by the seller. Don't waste your money! there are better choices!
customer_reviews.author: Indiana

customer_reviews.title: This has stood the pressure in a house full of long hair
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 5 months now in a house full of long-haired ladies (4 daughters and the misses). It has lasted well and the cable isn't all twisted like it tends to do on some models. There are no complaints from the girls and it isn't broken yet. I could be on to a record here if it lasts another couple of months. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mac

customer_reviews.title: Too hot, doesn’t improve frizz
customer_reviews.text: The speeds/heat settings are too extreme. Cold is high speed, warm is slow speed and hot is high speed but far too hot for your hair, your scalp, and your fingers. Fast drying = frizz, but this dryer was supposed to improve that. No, it doesn’t. It’s light weight for its size and the cord is long. But the heat/speed are such a nuisance for me that I wish I’d returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Orlie

customer_reviews.title: no good if you have short hair
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer is not for me, no good if you have short hair, it would suit Long to dry friz free but for short blowdrys it burns the end of hair, very hot setting and you either have HOT or COLD.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo I bought this as all the reviews were amazing - but personally I'm not impressed - you either get full on power burn your scalp option or full power cold option - no medium heat full power which my old hair dryer had. Thankfully I've still got my old hair dryer and that's the one we all still pick up to use instead of this one.
customer_reviews.author: MARK MEN

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer, poor quality plug
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughters & they love it, but have knocked one star off as the top plug terminal (plastic) snapped off as my daughter unplugged it, so I thought I would need to buy a plug, cut off the supplied one, & rewire it to the new plug. Shame, as it would've got 5 stars otherwise. Nice & powerful dryer - both girls have long, thick hair & it dries in 5 to 10 minutes (when the dryer has a working plug attached!). However, I notified Amazon of the problem (it was past the 'return' date) & they replaced the product immediately. Six stars to Amazon Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage.  Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hairdryer for 7 months and it intermittently blows hot air on the highest setting. I have to constantly jiggle the switch to get it hot. Today it made some horrible dying noise. Amazon won’t refund as out of 6mth warranty. My last Tresemme hairdryer was fantastic and lasted years. I thought this would be the same. It was cheap and plastic and I thought the switch seemed flimsy when I first received it. I should have followed my instincts and returned straight away! Don’t waste you money on this rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Jantan27

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this hairdryer in a rush after my old one decided to blow up on me. I needed something cheap that did the job. So far so good...im impressed with the hairdryer...it sounds around the same volume as precious hairdryers I have owned and seems pretty powerful for the money
customer_reviews.author: PurpleStorm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent power
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as her old Remington Hairdryer had packed in or was about to electrocute her... FOr the price I pad - £12 I thought it would be a piece of rubbish, how wrong were I, she is using it and said that the power is brilliant, she has long flowing blonde hair, which takes about 2 hours to wash (LOL), and about half an hour to dry, but with this Treseme hairdryer, she said its far more powerful that her old one (which I paid about £70 3 years ago), and it takes half the time to dry her hair. Now to find something that will cut her hair washing time down by half.. LOL
customer_reviews.author: dljitx

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted since 2014
customer_reviews.text: Amazon tells me that I have had this hairdryer since 2014. I was browsing alternatives today (4th August 2020) but I have to say I'm pretty satisfied with the value for money. I have very few complaints about this dryer: the flex could be a little longer and the cover at the end which keeps the filter on comes off rather too easily. It is not pretty and it has only basic controls but I do not find the hot too hot and the cool setting, while not cold, is much cooler. It drys quickly and I have used it every other day for 6 years, what's not to love!
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Very good value hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good value hairdryer. I had my last one which was this model for around 4 or 5 years and used it almost daily before the fan went on it. It survived may trips being bunged into my suitcase so i'd say it's quite robust. It gets quite hot but not too hot (there are 3 settings anyway and a 'cool' option) and drys my mid length hair in around 5 minutes. When the time came to replace it, I decided to buy the same again as could not really fault.
customer_reviews.author: Varia Queen of the Amazons

customer_reviews.title: TRESemme hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I have chosen this hairdryer as I have had an opportunity to use one in a hotel during my holiday and was really pleased with it. I have very strong cool drying very useful particularly on hot days. Hair feels smooth and silky even days after washing. and mustn't forget the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Amazed by the difference a good hairdryer makes!
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been using a battered hairdryer given to me by a family member and my hair has always been something of a nightmare. It took forever to dry and was always frizzy or messy. Last week it died in a cloud of smoke so I bought this hairdryer for next day delivery. I am honestly amazed by the difference this hairdryer makes. It cut my drying time in half, but more importantly my hair is sleek, straight and frizz free! I don't need to use straighteners anymore and my hair feels softer than ever. Very happy with the results, and at this bargain price I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light - no aching arms anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly light weight and surprisingly powerful! Whilst my hair is fine i do have a lot of it so takes ages to dry usually - not the case with this hairdryer! Dries my hair super quick and as it’s light you don’t get that achey arm feeling. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with next day delivery and didn't disappoint, whilst there is only switch so heat and speed cant be separately adjusted for the price it is a light hairdryer with enough power. Brilliant for hairdryer for uni
customer_reviews.author: Edn

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is brilliant. However feels that it’s made from low quality of plastic but that also makes it very lightweight. I have it at work in case I use shower there and it does the job for me. I don’t use it daily so all fines months later after purchase. At home I use GHD but wanted less expensive one to leave at work and does the job. Price can not be beaten for this.
customer_reviews.author: CoolZero

customer_reviews.title: Not as solid as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this as it feels very flimsy and the switch is loose so don't think it would last long. I also wrongly though it had 2 settings for speed and 3 for heat/cool but one switch controls all so you cannot have separate heat and speed. Shame as I had high expectations reading the reviews. I had my Clairol Hot Shot for over 35 years and this definitely wouldn't go the distance!
customer_reviews.author: MISS CHRISTINE M KEY

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money - great light weight hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer to replace an 8 year old remington one. This is a really good hair dryer, it is sturdy and really light weight, which makes it easy to hold. It doesn't get too hot and the concentrator nozzle it comes with makes styling easy. It has a long lead, about 2.4m long. Although it is really light weight it is not a travel hair dryer, so it is not foldable. At the bottom of the handle there is loop for hanging. The controls are at the inside of the handle so it is easy to change temperature and speed while using it. All in all a really good hair dryer and great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stadtmüller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful but great power
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and cheerful. But drys fast, has excellent power and is nice and light to hold which is always good in a hairdryer. For the brand I did expect the quality to be better but for £16 I'm not going complain, I needed it quickly as my other broke, I would recommend this as a back up or if your on i tight budget, it will work just fine. The cheapness is more about how it looks and feels. But is fine when being used drys faster then my old more expensive one. So all in all not a good hairdryer
customer_reviews.author: bean

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a rimmel hair dryer that broke after a number of years. I was going to replace it like for like, but I thought I’d try this one as it’s a third of the price. It’s great!! I have thick long ish hair and it does a great job. Good amount of hot air, easy to control, much lighter than the old one. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sr27

customer_reviews.title: Light weight hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer seems noisy compared to my old one but I think I just may have got used to my old one. It is powerful and does dry my thick hair quite quickly. It has a long cord which I really like. It is a good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these a few years but had trouble finding another one when that one eventually stopped working so I was thrilled to find this on Amazon. For a 'cheap' hairdryer, it actually works really well. The drying time is fab - much quicker than expensive ones and it's nice and lightweight too. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Treacle

customer_reviews.title: Good hairdryer, great value
customer_reviews.text: The wife's hairdryer (I haven't got enough hair!) broke and I needed a quick easy solution. Attracted immediately by price and reviews. Its great value - the only downside (the wife tells me) is that it doesn't have 2 proper "heat" speeds only the one....meaning if you want it hot - it has to be on the fast speed rather than a hot "slow" speed....ho Nevertheless - she likes it and tells me it is better than many she has owned at more than double (or more) the price.... Go for it....
customer_reviews.author: Totz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this. If I was walking through a store and saw this I would have never purchased a hairdryer for 12 pound - but my old one broke one day and my flatmate lended me hers, this one, and it is amazing. Doesn't heat up too much but the power is absolutely amazing and gets the job done quite fast. Also a nice size, love this.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer for the cost
customer_reviews.text: OK it's not a Dyson but who in their right mind would pay €400 for a hairdryer. This is light, powerful and has a good length of mains cord and does exactly what you need it to do. If it lasts 3 years I have worked out it would take a lifetime to get through these to cover the cost of the daft Dayson!
customer_reviews.author: Billersk

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is as good as a hairdryer gets
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and lightweight with the directional nozzle at the end increasing the pressure which speeds up drying time. Was bought as a gift for Christmas but the recipient noted it feels well made and the cord length is longer than average. RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: MrE

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: bought for wife as here old one was burning, she loves it, lightweight and had a decent length cable, whats not to like (we wont mention the £5 discount 3 weeks after i bought this lol) only downside is the two speed setting as old one had three so is always on turbo mode
customer_reviews.author: M. Mcallister

customer_reviews.title: A great dryer
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my thirteen year old son. He really likes it, and hasn't complained so far. It's lightweight, it dries his thick hair relatively fast. It's quite noisy, noisier than my own one, but still, for the price it's excellent value. I'm glad I bought it for him.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong for a tenner
customer_reviews.text: Really, a TRESemmé hair-dryer for just over £10? Bargain - can't go wrong with that, even if it only lasts a couple of months. Cord length is about normal at probably just shy of a metre and the drying power is about average for a hair-dryer (I guess?).
customer_reviews.author: Elliot B.

customer_reviews.title: powerful lightweight hairdryer.
customer_reviews.text: I instantly liked this when I put it in my hand comfortable to hold didn't cost the earth and not too weighty.Outshines my previous ones which were too heavy and cumbersome for me. Time will tell if it is worthy of 5stars as my previous hairdryers only lasted 3 years.-Nothing is built to last these days but for the cost if I get a couple of years out it I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: kfclady

customer_reviews.title: First use and overheated!🤨
customer_reviews.text: It blew up the first time I used it! over heated at the filter and became extremely hot and smelt awful of melted plastic. So pleased I attempted to use the hair dryer first rather than one of my three daughters! Returned item and awaiting refund. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer but no separate heat and power settings
customer_reviews.text: Good lightweight dryer which gives heat and cold settings but you can’t have a mid heat on high fan as there is only one control ‘slide’ annoying for me when drying the boys hair. But it’s probably my fault for not checking when buying
customer_reviews.author: pgolfer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, great hair dryer, had my previous 1 for 15 years and always hard getting one to live up to expectation. Great power and leaves hair silky soft, buttons on an ideal location and can't catch them by mistake. Dries hair quickly without making it static. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Emilys7

customer_reviews.title: Delighted.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace a VERY expensive Dyson which blew up after two years light use. This is better in every way. Lighter, more balanced in the hand and a much a stronger air flow. And at a fraction of the Dyson price. For those who value function over design.
customer_reviews.author: William Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this dryer after my last one broke and I known how brilliant this dryer was going to be I would have brought it a long time ago. Lightweight and great drying I would highly recommend to anyone. Even brought one for my mum who has a frozen shoulder as it is light enough for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and very sturdy this is my second one my sister snatched mine she likes it so much. Great quality . I have very thick and abundant hair and it dries very quickly . Cord could’ve been slightly longer but this doesn’t dampen the overall experience
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive no-frills hairdrier.
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive, fairly light, no-frills, 2200W hairdryer from a well-known maker. It has a basic concentrator and something called a tourmaline-ceramic grille to produce an even heat distribution. Well, maybe. The filter is easily removable for cleaning dust, hairs etc., and it has 2 heat/speed setting (note that the heat and speed are not separately adjustable) the highest of which is very hot indeed. The cord is about 2.4m, which while not overly generous, is just about adequate. Overall, this is a simple device that should meet the needs of many people.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as I couldn’t afford my usual hairdryer so went for this cheaper option. I was not very impressed. The hot setting is way too hot and burned my hands when touching my hair. My hair has been extremely dry and frizzy since using this. Part of the dryer fell apart. But I half expected this with the low price. I wouldn’t recommend x
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Parkin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The Mrs says it's better than her previous one, was bought specifically because it's cord was longer than other ones around this price range. Her previous one died suddenly and she needed something next day (thanks prime) It's not the most hi-tech or the best but she's happy with it just now especially at its price point
customer_reviews.author: Mr W

customer_reviews.title: Mum was delighted! :)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hair dryer and doesn't dry the hair to a crisp! Bought as a gift for mum who has had alopecia and her hair was very fragile. Having this means she can now add some volume and style as her hair grows in and she is delighted. Thankyou so much
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Not safe, really poor quality after 8 months the hair dryer stopped, started working. Making strange noises. Smoke coming out the back and over heating. Avoid this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Al & Josh

customer_reviews.title: Simply too hot for comfort
customer_reviews.text: Well cold, hot and even hotter are the 3 temperature setting available. I have to hold the drier some way from my head to be comfortable with the heat produced. I figure that this product will become a 'real pain' to use.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Staniforth

customer_reviews.title: Powerful hairdryer, would recomend!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this hairdryer. The only reason it got 4 stars is the button. It is hard to slide up and down especially with not completely dry fingers. Sometimes I'd have to use my nails to push it up. But I would still buy it again. There are many pros: Long cord Looks nice 3 settings, high and low hot and a high cool Price Power I was pleasantly surprised how powerful it was. I have short hair so it only takes like 30 seconds to dry my hair. I would recommend this hairdryer to anyone looking for value for money and don't mind the sliding button.
customer_reviews.author: Hedi.S.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Negative points first: 1. the on/off/speed select button does not offer much grip to operate 2. the surface near the nozzle gets too hot to the touch Still, excellent for the price, and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Great hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it dries my hair exactly how I need. Good size for my hand, speed and temperature. Wash my hair daily, so it comes to use and function well. It is not too small, but lightweight, pack it for travels as well.
customer_reviews.author: Monika D.

customer_reviews.title: Make your wife happy today - buy her this hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as an 'upgrade' from her Philips. Unbeknownst to me at the time, the Philips she had was a top-rated model (which the TreSemme is based off of apparently - a Conair unit), only this was lighter to hold and maneuverer - a definite positive. Because it does everything the old one did, has a hotter setting and is lighter, it gets full top marks from me. It is one of the best, and the reviews don't lie.
customer_reviews.author: Rouby

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife to replace her old one which was the same model. It had lasted years so happy just to buy the same one again. Only negative is the cool setting could be cooler but let’s face it most hairdryers get used on the heat setting (I think, I’m a middle-aged balding man!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Adrian T

customer_reviews.title: Great on full heat - not on half
customer_reviews.text: Great if your hair can stand full heat. Unfortunately on the half heat setting the blow speed also drops to that of an asthmatic hamster. Not great for easily frazzled fine hair that can't take full heat. Other than that seems sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Rose

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just what i wanted. Has a bit more heat them most other dryers, which can be too cool for my hair with a curl. Very light in weight and simple to hold and use. Three good choices of fast cool, slow hot and fast hot.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: great value for money
customer_reviews.text: wow, its every bit as good as it says it is. A powerful and controllable hair dryer that is great for blow drying. My only slight negative is the control button for hot/cold/low and full power could be easier to manage when you are using hand to hold and style but I will soon get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C A Knight

customer_reviews.title: Tresseme hair dryer.?
customer_reviews.text: Delivery speedy, great service all round. The dryer is a belter, I live with frizz on the ends of my hair I used this and the straightness was so shiny, and no frizz at all, just long lushes hair. Best dryer I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Only one heat setting which is boiling hot, I burn my scalp or my hands while trying to move my hair as I dry it! Also extremely loud. It makes my ears ring. Ended up replacing after a few months because everyone in the house complained about it.
customer_reviews.author: EGC

customer_reviews.title: Not good for frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: Light in weight, but mine was faulty, when put on the hot setting no heat was coming so could not dry hair. I have returned rather that exchange as when the cold air was blowing out my hair was going everywhere, not like other ones I've had of the same power so don't feel it is ,uch uses to frizz prone hair.
customer_reviews.author: Louise1864

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a bloke
customer_reviews.text: The hairdryer, it dries my hair. The slow speed is vaguely warm then there is a hot slow speed and hot fast speed. Perfect for drying men’s hair, I can’t comment on women’s hair I’m not a woman.
customer_reviews.author: Andy S

customer_reviews.title: Great hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when my 10yr old one packed in. It was delivered next day and has not disappointed me. It's light weight and very comfortable to hold . The settings are ideal for me and positioned well so you can easily switch from hot to cool air when required. Overall I would buy this again as its great product at a very good price. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Blow and go! 💨⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️😇
customer_reviews.text: 💛 Lightweight and ergonomically manufactured... 💛 Stylish in design. 💛 Doesn’t feel overly hot when in use. 💛 Great packaging and super fast delivery courtesy of ‘Prime’...
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Hot and cold air
customer_reviews.text: *Update, It only uses cold air when on the strongest setting and will only blow out hot air when on the lowest. Total rubbish. Unfortunately, it keeps switching from hot to cold when on the hottest setting. Quite frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but ok if not bothered much about your hair
customer_reviews.text: Works one but feels very cheap; don’t let the high power fool you this have very little control. Cold or boiling hot and just two speeds for hot. This is our spare so fine mainly me but wife won’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: a casual reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great hairdryer. The cool setting is as strong as the hottest which is quite unusual as normally really week. Lightweight to hold and really nice long cord to make sure it reaches if you're not lucky enough to have a plug next to the dressing table.
customer_reviews.author: AmyN1980

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight hairdryer that seems to dry my hair in a reduced time compared to my old one. I recommended it to a friend and she also loves it. Fantastic hairdryer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rhian JJ

customer_reviews.title: This was a present
customer_reviews.text: M. Bleu is delighted with the hairdryer as - like Poirot - he likes every hair in the right place on his head. He says it's the best he's ever had... n'est-ce pas! He leaves it on the ironing board, which is also required near his bed.
customer_reviews.author: Vidubo

customer_reviews.title: Good value product!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful hairdryer! Dries speedily and I feel does create a smooth effect, as for noise, well it's a hairdryer so expect some. The design is ergonomic and no poorly placed buttons, and a manageable weight, all adds to a good product! Excellent price tag also!
customer_reviews.author: louise-marie

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I'm not convinced that this hairdryer is ionic as stated as there is no indicator at all for this on the hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Uber-babe

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok if not a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hairdryer to replace a Nicky Clarke one that exploded after 9 months *eye roll*. It seems ok, has enough power to dry my thick hair in a reasonable time, it just feels a little toy like but that’s just me being fussy.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Drying time
customer_reviews.text: I got Long hair and I tried this product and found it dries my hair much quicker than my old product, it has variable settings and a cool shot too ... I recommend this hair dryer great value for money .....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor dryer for a good brand
customer_reviews.text: No cool button Both heat settings very hot Stopped using as finding quite damaging to hair Get what you pay for but thought a good brand and price reflected good deal. Live and learn they ssy
customer_reviews.author: nickw

customer_reviews.title: Great hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hairdryer, the diffuser is great for doing a nice blow out at home. It has two heat settings and also a cold setting. I use the lower setting which works great. I'd definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great hair dryer for the price. Dries hair quickly. Only downfall is that you can’t have it on low heat and high speed or high heat and low speed. Only one switch to control the heat/speed.
customer_reviews.author: EllieJane

customer_reviews.title: High quality drier
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money as it dries my hair after a shower within a couple of minutes, still efficient in use even though I use it a couple of times a week, overall good quality.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hooton

customer_reviews.title: cord length is good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old hairdryer which was the same make and it is just as good as my old one. The cord length is a very good , much longer than most.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: very light weight powerful hair drier.
customer_reviews.text: Having owned a previous older version Tresemme hair drier we were surprised how light the new one is in comparison to the old. It also gets very hot and I would recommend you use it on the first setting and not do what we did and go straight for the full blast option. Good price and capable drier.
customer_reviews.author: Tele-Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an exmas present for my daughter, as she is using the same one which other daughter has they love these hairdryers and it was great value from here
customer_reviews.author: Mandalynne

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this hair dryer to replace my speedy 2200W. It is lightweight, fairly small and the cord length is fine, but it just lacks the power when compared to other 2200W dryers. And really, there are plenty of other dryers on the market that are "around" the same price ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tresemme Dryer is the best value for money!
customer_reviews.text: i like to use the cold dryer and this type enable you to use the cold dryer without having to pressed for cold dryer button all the time. there is the specific setting for it and it is very light.
customer_reviews.author: Tavisha

customer_reviews.title: A lot of hot air
customer_reviews.text: This seems to produce a lot of hot air and a lot of noise. Just like my daughter. She says it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lord Riley

customer_reviews.title: Very good drier - recommended
customer_reviews.text: Why buy more expensive hair dryers when you can get this - very good drier with fast/slow and hot/cold options - longer than average cord length - very good value for money
customer_reviews.author: csuza

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: The best hairdryer I ever owned! It takes me only a few minutes to style my shoulder length hair with this hair dryer. It is really quick and the warmth is perfect. I like how strong the speed of cool setting is so it is actually possible to dry your hair on this setting.
customer_reviews.author: Irina G

customer_reviews.title: I had a TRESemme hairdryer before and it was amazing! Hoping this would be similar
customer_reviews.text: I would strongly suggest everyone against buying this! I had a TRESemme hairdryer before and it was amazing! Hoping this would be similar, it is actually the most useless piece of plastic I ever bought. I definitely believe this is a scam or just a failed copy , but it's nothing like the proper TRESemme I've been using for years! Complete fail!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: This hair dryer was just the ticket
customer_reviews.text: Great hairdryer my daughter loves it and it does all it says it does, it must be good as my daughter who is fussy with these sort of things has complained about it at all, so it was a great buy :)
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Tipping

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd spent a bit more
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it does what it says, but it takes ages to dry my hair, a third longer than my previous dryer. I wish I'd spent £10 more and got something more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: MRS O

customer_reviews.title: Good basic hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Good for a no fills hairdryer. Not premium and feels pretty cheap but this matches up to the price and does the job of drying hair so is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Terrible package!
customer_reviews.text: I very much disliked the dryer delivered in its own box! With labels all over it! This was bought as a present, looks disgracefu!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: An excellent hairdryer which light weight to hold and very fast drying my hair. Does exactly what it should and good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great price but I find the standard temperature a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price but I find the standard temperature a bit too hot and I don't have the time or patience to persevere with the cool jet as it takes ages to dry my hair using just this one. Good long cord
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Did not arrive in a box only the original box that was damaged. Had to give it for a present & was not impressed so put it in a gift bag instead. Dries hair well. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but too hot!
customer_reviews.text: While this definitely works (and for the price is a deal), I must say that it is not optimal. The hottest temperature is VERY HOT (arguably too hot), while the next level down barely blows any air at all. I often resort to just using the cool option, but I feel that it may not work as well for styling hair. I will definitely keep this for now, but if it breaks, I will probably explore another option.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Not good value for money
customer_reviews.text: This has not got much power and with postage was expensive!! Could of gone to a local shop and had much better for less money
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Improved my hair condition
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, long cord good temperature controls, and dries my hair much quicker than my old hairdryer. Started using at Christmas, it's now 1st Feb and can already tell the condition of my hair has improved as I'm not spending too long drying it
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Such a good product for the price. Don’t waste your money on a more expensive hairdryer this one does it all. It dries the hair quick and does not make it frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicol Dziedzic

customer_reviews.title: Quite disappointed in this hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed in this hairdryer. The plug is really small and a weird shape so it can be annoying to pull it out of the wall. Also there is only 1 setting adjuster meaning if you want the top level of heat you need to have it on the top level of power or if you wanted it on the cooler heat setting you need to have it on the lowest power setting. I dose have some positive, it is very light and I was cheap
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Ended up in the bin.
customer_reviews.text: Wife hated this hair dryer from day one, complaining that it got way too hot and smelt like it was burning. after just a few months it went in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Second one in over 10 years or so
customer_reviews.text: Second one I've bought after my first one died after a long and full on use. Didn't want to look around as I knew this was a gooden. Does what it says on the run but very reliable and V4M.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah K

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, postage arrived quickly with no problems, couldn't possibly ask for any more with my purchase of the product
customer_reviews.author: Lee Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great drier
customer_reviews.text: Bought after putting up with a travel hairdrier for years and waiting for my husband to buy me one for my birthday. I'm glad I gave up and bought it myself. It is quick and efficient, drying my hair in no time and without any static build up. It has a drying setting, a cool setting and a hot but less powerful setting for styling hair. I still am trying to master that one!
customer_reviews.author: A. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good performance and long lead
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter who is delighted, she particularly likes the long lead and the short drying time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister for Christmas. She uses it to date without any issues. Cheap, reliable, quality brand. haven't experienced it myself (",) but she said it's a great new hair dryer without any flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew's Review Corner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this since February and has broken already, on button jammed so I could not switch it off so had to turn it off at the plug. Today while using it I can smell burning really disappointed. Will choose better next time.
customer_reviews.author: Emma C.

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful for the wattage it has
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the power of this hair dryer. I went from a 2000w one to this 2200w and it is noticeably weaker. Also had some oil/lubricant leaking out the seam.
customer_reviews.author: A. D

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended This is my second hairdryer . Last one was used alot for five years so it did its duty well. You can't go wrong with these. 13 is cheap to me. It dries your hair quicker than other hair dryers. It has different settings. It's great
customer_reviews.author: mememe

product_meta.title: TRESemme 5542DU 2200Watts Power Dryer
product_meta.description: Inspired by the salon, the TRESemm? Power Dryer 2200 delivers top quality performance for fast drying and effortless styling. Featuring a powerful 2200 watts fan and ionic conditioning technology, this hair dryer gives a penetrating air flow with a high shine finish. The Power Dryer 2200 gives you total control of your drying routine as it features 2 heat and 2 speed settings as well as a cool setting for finishing and setting your style. When drying your hair, the Power Dryer 2200 releases a constant stream of balancing ions to enhance conditioning of your hair and eliminate frizz. This gives you beautiful and shiny hair with a glossy finish. For easy styling and smooth, even heat distribution, use the salon style concentrator nozzle for even faster frizz-free results. The Power Dryer 2200 is an essential part of the TRESemm? Smooth range of styling tools. All of the styling tools in the Smooth range are specially designed ? and salon inspired - to make sure that your hair is left silky smooth and frizz free without flyaway hairs. TRESemm? styling tools are always designed to last. For extra peace of mind, the Power Dryer 2000 comes with a 3 year manufacturer?s guarantee, so you can buy with confidence. From our origins in salons, we have always been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look fabulous without spending a fortune. TRESemm? is dedicated to creating hair care and styling products that are salon quality without the salon price. Salon inspired, stylist tested products to help you create your own style and experience that salon feeling every day. Product Features- 2200W- 2 heat and speed settings plus cool setting- Heat balancing tourmaline ceramic technology- Removable filter for easy cleaning- Concentrator nozzle- Hanging loop- Lightweight and Compact- 3 year guarantee
